name: Jason Bateman
summary:
Jason Bateman. Actor: Arrested Development. Jason Bateman is an American film and television actor, known for his role as Michael Bluth on the television sitcom Arrested Development (2003), as well as his role on Valerie (1986).

He was born in Rye, New York. His father, Kent Bateman, from a Utah-based family, is a film and television director and producer, and founder of a Hollywood repertory stage company. His mother, Victoria Bateman,...
awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy | 18 wins & 89 nominations total
